form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: MEDICAL Examination of Applicants for United States Visas

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/4/2023 PLACE MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS SOMBAT FOR UNITED STATES VISAS DATE OF EXAMINATION 3.8.88//86086375 CITY COUNTRY At the request of the American Consul at SOMEAY INDIA NAME AGE SEX MAGANLAL KASHANCHAND SHAH 81 M I certify that on the above date I examined WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON E 480292 A HME DA BAD 29.7.88 I examined specifically for evidence of any of the following conditions: CLASS A: DANGEROUS CONTAGIOUS DISEASES: Chancroid : Lymphogranuloma venereum Gonorrhea Syphilis, infectious stage Granuloma inguinale Tuberculosis, active Leprosy, infectious MENTAL CONDITIONS: Mental retardation Previous occurrence of one or more Mental defect (mental deficiency) attacks of insanity Narcotic drug addiction Insanity Psychopathic personality Chronic alcoholism Sexual deviation (See proviso, sec. 34.7, USPHS Regs.) CLASS B: Physical Defect, Disease, or Disability Serious in Degree or Permanent in Nature Amounting to a Substantial Departure from Normal Physical Well-Being. CLASS C: Minor Conditions. (CHECK NUMBER (1) BELOW OR COMPLETE NUMBER (2)) My examination, including the X-ray and other reports below, revealed: (1) No defect, disease, or disability. (2) Defect, disease, or disability, or previous occurrence of one or more attacks of insanity, as follows (give class-A B, or C-diagnosis, and pertinent details*): Vitiligo face , hands & chest. NO PULMONARY OR PLEURAL LESION SEEN, Chest X-ray report Dr. M. Tayabali from Dr. KAHNTEST NEGATIVE HILV (III) ANTIBODIES OR (MRS.) F. E. PALIA Blood serological report NOT DETECTED from Dr. Other special report(s) (when needed) B. M.MEHERHOMJI from Dr. SIGNATURE OF MEDICAL/TECHNICAL ADVISOR Smith TITLE DATE OF FINAL REPORT MEDICAL EXAMINER 5.8.88 50157-102 *Continue on reverse side if necessary. OPTIONAL FORM 157 (Rev. 5-78) GPO : 1985 O - 479-003 Dept. of State
